amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, limits to fifty percent the amount an eligible public entity may use to make loan guarantees for economic development under the Community Development Block Grant loan guarantee program used for housing purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 42 in the Congressional Record of May 7, 1996, to limit to 10% the portion of a city's loan guarantees for economic development under the Community Development Block Grant loan guarantee progam that could be used for housing activies.

action.text: Waters amendment (A027) modified by unanimous consent. The modification changes the percentage amount discussed from 10 to 50 percent.
On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A027) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
